byline.original: By STEVEN LEE MYERS and THOMAS FULLER
byline.contributor: Steven Lee Myers reported from Washington, and Thomas Fuller from Bangkok.

snippet: The thaw in relations with the United States follows a political transition in Myanmar that has raised the possibility that the new government will ease restrictions on basic freedoms.
lead_paragraph: The thaw in relations with the United States follows a political transition in Myanmar that has raised the possibility that the new government will ease restrictions on basic freedoms.

headline.main: Detecting a Thaw in Myanmar, U.S. Aims to Encourage Change
headline.print_headline: Detecting a Thaw in Myanmar, U.S. Aims to Encourage Change
headline.seo: United States Aims to Encourage Change in Myanmar
